message: Let's split it nearly in half to be fair, but I get slightly more since I made the first offer.
Let's split it more evenly this time, I think 55/45 is fair.  We can always negotiate more in the next round if we need to.
I understand you want a more even split, but I think it's only fair I get slightly more since you rejected my initial offer. This is the same split you offered me, just reversed.
